Author: bigglob
Text: Like what the other person said lol, is a flex and probably going to be rough. Please remember to drink more water bc I find it helps you get through the lax hit more comfortably + drinks with electrolytes + a hot water bottle is an A++ choice. Just lots of fluids to help you ride it out. Take care aaa

Author: oopsiesidk
Text: Probably both a flex and a setup for a baddd time later hahah
